column1: Are there special groups that receive BCG?

column3: kids of immigrant families (from high inc countries), kids living with relative with TB, kids in high inc coutries for prolongeed stay, kids whose families request BCG, older kids from high inc countries who have yet to start school.

column1: How often is the policy assessed?

column3: BCG vaccine is contraindicated in children weighing less than 2500 grams, children of HIV positive mother, children who have their immunity compromised by congenital immunodeficiency, AIDS leukemis, lymphoma, immune response suppressed by steroids, antimetabolites or radiation.
